meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>short</kanji> <kanji>period of time</kanji> is the <vocabulary>short term</vocabulary>. You know not to think short term anyways, right? You're learning kanji, after all.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
